skill_1.descSkill: Harry attacks with his shield, and reduces the damage he takes for the rest of the turn.
skill_1.textSkill: Harry donne un coup de bouclier !

skill_2.descSkill: Harry makes a strong shield attack.

skill_4.descSkill: Acts first. Harry greatly reduces the damage he takes for the rest of the turn.

skill_5.descSkill: Acts first. Harry uses his shield to propel Flaux and increase her damage if she attacks this turn.
skill_5.textSkill: Flaux rebondit sur le bouclier de Harry !

skill_6.descSkill: Acts first. Flaux can't be targeted or damaged for the rest of the turn.

skill_7.descSkill: Flaux attacks with her scythe. So nice!
skill_7.textSkill: Flaux bondit et donne un coup vertical !

skill_8.descSkill: Flaux mows down all enemies at once. So strong!

skill_9.descSkill: Flaux aims for a weak spot and increases the damage an enemy takes for the rest of the turn. So cool!
skill_9.textSkill: Flaux découpe les protections de l'ennemi !

skill_10.descSkill: Flaux takes some time to greatly increase the damage of her next attack.
